languages.text: "Их питает не смерть, а страдания. Они цепляются за жизнь, обреченные давным давно".
"It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
languages.original_text: "Их питает не смерть, а страдания. Они цепляются за жизнь, обреченные давным давно".

traits.locale_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
"It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
"It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
"It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
"It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

languages.text: "Nicht der Tod nährt sie, sondern das Leid. Sie klammern sich ans Leben, obwohl sie vor langer Zeit dem Untergang geweiht wurden."
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht der Tod nährt sie, sondern das Leid. Sie klammern sich ans Leben, obwohl sie vor langer Zeit dem Untergang geweiht wurden."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas la mort qui les sustente, mais la souffrance. Ils se raccrochent à la vie alors qu'ils étaient déjà condamnés à disparaître il y a des lustres. »
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas la mort qui les sustente, mais la souffrance. Ils se raccrochent à la vie alors qu'ils étaient déjà condamnés à disparaître il y a des lustres. »

languages.text: «No es la muerte lo que los alimenta, sino el sufrimiento. Se aferran a la vida, pese a que fueron condenados hace mucho».
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

traits.locale_text: «No es la muerte lo que los alimenta, sino el sufrimiento. Se aferran a la vida, pese a que fueron condenados hace mucho».

languages.text: 「彼らを養うのは死ではなく、苦しみよ。彼らは生きることにしがみついている。とっくに死ぬ運命だったというのに」
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らを養うのは死ではなく、苦しみよ。彼らは生きることにしがみついている。とっくに死ぬ運命だったというのに」

languages.text: “他们渴望的并不是死亡，而是痛苦。尽管他们很久以前便早已在劫难逃，但他们依然不肯放手。”
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

traits.locale_text: “他们渴望的并不是死亡，而是痛苦。尽管他们很久以前便早已在劫难逃，但他们依然不肯放手。”

languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."

languages.text: "Onları ölüm değil, acı besler. Her ne kadar uzun vakitler önce ölüme mahkûm edilmiş olsalar da hayata tutunurlar."
languages.original_text: "It is not death that feeds them, but suffering. They cling to life, though they were doomed long ago."
